com.mindfusion.common

Class RectangleD

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.common.RectangleD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RectangleD
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Externalizable
    Stores a set of four integers that represent the location and size of a rectangle. Instances of this class are immutable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RectangleD Empty
      Represents a rectangle with all properties set to zero.
